name: Crimsonland
summary:
Crimsonland is a top-down computer game with RPG elements.It was developed by 10tons Entertainment and published by Reflexive Entertainment in 2003.

Upon the beginning player is placed in the middle of a game location with a weapon, health points and zero experience. The screen is gradually filled with different monsters. Getting a large amount of kills, character earns experience, levels up and gets rewarded with perks such as faster reloading, extra speed and so on.
